detail_desc: Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Cut out section on one shoulder and at the back.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed, stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline and decorative buttons down the front.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.
Short coat in a woven wool blend with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Zipped side pockets. Lined.
Short, wide coat in soft faux shearling with notch lapels, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and large patch pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck at the front and long sleeves.
Top in a cotton weave with short cap sleeves and a gathered, elasticated neckline.
Body in jersey with a sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a low-cut back, high-cut legs and press-studs at the crotch. Lined.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy jersey with a deep V-neck, gently draped pleats at the top, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Large elastic scrunchie in velour.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with thin shoulder pads, notch lapels, flap welt front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Long-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Fisherman’s hat in patterned cotton twill. Lined.
Short dressing gown in cool satin with lace sections. Wrapover front with concealed ties at one side, a sewn-in tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length, scallop-trimmed sleeves.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Short skirt in velour with reversible sequins. High waist with concealed elastication. Jersey lining.
Wide blouse in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a wide, elasticated neckline and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Cardigan in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves, slits in the sides and no buttons.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a lined drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch, patterned twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 44-53 cm.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10.5 cm.
Stretch imitation leather leggings with decorative seams on the legs and wide jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Fully lined sports bralette in ribbed microfibre with wide ribbing at the hem and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Short dungaree dress in imitation leather with adjustable straps that fasten with press-studs and a visible zip down the front. Lined at the top.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with overlocked frill trims at the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Velour top in a relaxed fit with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side. Unlined.
Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.
Pleated skirt in jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with woven shoulder sections, long sleeves, a woven, zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, flounces at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short, wrapover skirt in imitation suede with a high waist, embroidery on the front and visible press-studs at one side. Lined.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Classic T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.

Calf-length jumpsuit in imitation leather with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves with turn-ups. Seam with narrow elastication and a wide tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets lined in recycled polyester, and wide, straight legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fully lined, hole-patterned bikini top with an elasticated hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Decorative bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjama bottoms in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 100x200 cm.

Blouse in a crisp weave. Open section at the back with ties at the back of the neck and middle of the back. Half-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam at the waist with a peplum.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut T-shirt in fine-knit cotton and silk in a relaxed fit with slits in the sides.

Set with a hat, pair of mittens and tube scarf in a soft knit. Jersey-lined hat with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties underneath. Jersey-lined mittens (size 2-6M without thumbs) with foldover ribbing at the cuffs.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No buttons.
Short, wide turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Low, imitation leather sandals with an elasticated heel strap. Rubber insoles and soles.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Jacket in supersoft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
A-line dress in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.
Soft toy made of soft velour with polyester padding dressed in a removable tulle dress with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Length approx. 23 cm.

Short, padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen, with a lined hood with a wide faux fur trim, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and handwarmer pockets with a flap and press-stud. Concealed drawstring at the waist and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
